questions.question: Your workspace requires the user to enter their credentials to access a web service.  Which type of published parameter will hide their credentials?
The Choice parameter type using the Drop Down mode allows you to pick multiple options.
When might you best use the Choice with Alias parameter?
options: When letting users choose the output coordinate system.
When defining a private value for destination format encoding.
When letting users choose a buffer distance in meters.
When letting users choose a Database Connection.
